ISSUE.TITLE: Mysql driver problem
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi! I've installed drone with the mysql driver. All went well, untill I started building a repository. I've used a gitlab repository. And it seems that drone tries to clone it with user/password combination instead of using the ssh keys. I converted that setup into the default sqlite database and all went well. In the mysql repo table, the username and password was an empty string, instead of NULL. Could this be the bug?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: add host.docker.internal:host-gateway as extra host to support linux containers (#529)
